description:
The Birdman Pack includes a set of 10 unique skateboard decks from Birdhouse, Powell-Peralta® and a one-of-a-kind deck created by the Skatepark Project team for your Create-A-Skater character in Tony Hawk's™ Pro Skater™ 1 + 2.

Activision is proud to team up with The Skatepark Project, the nonprofit organization founded by Tony Hawk to develop public skateparks in underserved communities in the US. 100% of Activision's net proceeds from this pack will go towards supporting the nonprofit's mission to create more skateparks for youth in the US. This is a limited time offer that will end December 31st 2021 or once $500,000 USD have been raised for the cause, whichever comes first.
name: Tony Hawk’s™ Pro Skater™ 1 + 2 - The Birdman Pack
